mapper.select: SELECT e.year, e.term, b.id AS 'schId', a.id AS 'courseId', a.`name` AS 'courseName', c.name AS 'courseSite', a.campus AS 'courseCampus', d.`name` AS 'teacherName', b.limit_person AS 'limitPerson', e.week_class_time AS 'weekClassTime', a.sex, b.section AS 'sectionTime' FROM zc_sports_course AS a INNER JOIN zc_sports_schedules AS b ON a.id = b.course_id INNER JOIN zc_sports_site AS c ON a.site_id = c.id INNER JOIN zc_user AS d ON b.teacher_uid = d.id INNER JOIN zc_sports_config AS e ON e.year = #{year} AND e.term = #{term}

SELECT b.id AS 'courseId', b.limit_person AS 'count' FROM zc_sports_course AS a INNER JOIN zc_sports_schedules AS b ON a.id = b.course_id INNER JOIN zc_sports_site AS c ON a.site_id = c.id INNER JOIN zc_user AS d ON b.teacher_uid = d.id ORDER BY b.id
